Description: Pottery ostracon with part of one incised line - Coptic (?), from the rim of a vessel, with incised line below shoulder, inside of rim painted white, inside of body painted with black stroke and white oval (?).
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394075) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394075)
